name: AdrenalMass
title: Adrenal Mass
description: This value set is used to calculate OP-10 (Abdomen Computed Tomography (CT)—Use of Contrast Material), a claims-based measure used in the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services' Hospital Outpatient Quality Reporting (HOQR) Program. In calculation of OP-10, diagnoses of adrenal mass must appear on the abdomen CT claim to be excluded from the measure’s initial patient population.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains ICD-10 codes associated with unspecified disorders of the adrenal gland.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have unspecified disorders of the adrenal gland.),(Inclusion Criteria: ICD-10 codes associated with unspecified disorders of the adrenal glands are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Disorders in other regions of the endocrine system and elsewhere are excluded from the value set. Codes captured in systems other than ICD-10 are also excluded from the value set.)
